features: STYLISH DESIGN: The Lucas Mini Crib fits easily into any nursery decor thanks to its mid-century meets modern design. Its simple clean lines, full side panels, rounded spindles and tapered legs give it a timeless vibe. Choose from four elegant finishes

MATTRESS MATTERS: The crib has a 3-position adjustable mattress height and comes with the mandatory 1” mattress pad. Choose a Dream On Me non-toxic, Greenguard Gold certified mini or portable crib mattress for a perfect fit

MAKING SAFETY A PRIORITY: This Lucas is JPMA Certified to meet or exceed all safety standards set by the CPSC/ASTM. All our products are tested by 3rd party labs for lead and other toxic elements to meet or exceed CPSC and ASTM safety standards.
BUILT TO LAST: The Lucas is built of durable, sustainable and renewable New Zealand pinewood. Only non-toxic, child-safe, water-based finishes are used. Product dimensions are 39Lx25.5Lx33H inches
body.description: Dream On Me Lucas mini crib is a must-have which was inspired by mid-century modern. Its refined design offers simple clean lines, full side panels, rounded spindles, and completed with tapered legs this timeless crib means it will effortlessly fit into any nursery décor. The Dream On Me Lucas is crafted from sturdy New Zealand pinewood, it’s a durable and versatile addition to any modern nursery. All Dream On Me cribs is JPMA certified and meet all applicable ASTM and CPSC standards. All of our products are tested by third-party labs for lead and other toxic elements to meet or exceed CPSC and ASTM safety standards.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for our tiny nursery
reviews.reviewText: When I say the nursery is tiny- I mean it is basically a closet. This fits perfect along side my breastfeeding chair. The wood is beautiful and the green is just like pictured.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty good love the color!
reviews.reviewText: I like this crib but I definitely recommend purchasing a better mattress and it’s not super sturdy. Other than that I love this crib

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Even cuter in person!
reviews.reviewText: It was overall very easy to put together! I kept mistaking what the instructions said so it took me a little longer lol. I love the crib it’s definitely way cuter in person! Perfect size for my son’s room considering we’re limited on space!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The perfect size for a small space
reviews.reviewText: This crib is the perfect size to put in our small room. Its the same size as a pack n play so we are able to move it around and adjust it as needed. It only took me about 20 minutes to put together by myself and has held up very well, but the paint is starting to chip minorly after just 7 months of use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars The wood had chips it in :(
reviews.reviewText: I was sad to see on some of the sides the wood was chipped and broken

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Horrible idea to buy this. Don't buy this crib.
reviews.reviewText: I never write reviews. But boy do I feel strongly about this purchase. Do not buy this crib! I purchased it for our foster children, anticipating a cute, modern crib that would last me a few placements. This crib broke within a month of one baby using it. And the baby is not even pulling up or super active. One of the legs completely broke off and is so stripped, there is no fixing it securely. The leg broke when I put my baby into the crib one night!!! Nothing I did was different than other nights, it just broke off, causing the crib to lean at an angle. Upon removing her and looking closer, none of the legs were secure like they had been on assembly and couldn't be fixed or screwed back in. We reached out to the company and they refused a refund. This is a safety issue and outrageous. The crib is absolutely adorable but no place for a child.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful mini crib with some cosmetic flaws
reviews.reviewText: The crib arrived quickly and was relatively easy and straightforward to set up. The thin mattress (more like a 1/2” pad) that comes with it may be okay if you use it as a playpen, but we bought a thicker mattress to go with it. Love the color combo of the natural wood and green that goes well with our decor. However it arrived with a paint scratch on it, and within a couple days we noticed more paint scratched off. It’s not enough for us to want to return or replace it, but noticeable enough to think the quality might not be the best and the paint will all be rubbed off in a few months. Can’t complain too much for the price, and our son will probably not be in it for too long.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Yess, your baby girl nursery needs this!
